Title: Shamsi to Gregorian
Description:
Features:
*Convert Shamsi date to Gregorian date.
*Convert Gregorian date to Shamsi date.
*Show current Shamsi and Gregorian date.

Requirement:
*You need .NET framework 3.5 to install this program
